it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions

Class SAPEREReaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions.AReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
      • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.reactions.SAPEREReaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>, Serializable, Comparable<IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>>

    public class SAPEREReaction
extends AReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
    This class realizes a reaction with Lsa concentrations.
    See Also:

      • screen

        private static void screen(List<ILsaMolecule> listmol)
        This method screens the lsaMolecule list, deleting all molecule which can be covered from another one more generic.
        Parameters:
        listmol - List of lsaMolecule to screen

      • cloneOnNewNode

        public IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> cloneOnNewNode(INode<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> n)
        Description copied from interface: IReaction
        This method allows to clone this reaction on a new node. It may result useful to support runtime creation of nodes with the same reaction programming, e.g. for morphogenesis.
        Parameters:
        n - The node where to clone this IReaction
        Returns:
        the cloned action

        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        getActions in class AReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Returns:
        The list of the actions of the IReaction. There is no specification if the list will be a copy of the internal list or a reference. It will depend on implementations. Please be careful when you modify this list.

      • getInfluencedMolecules

        public List<ILsaMolecule> getInfluencedMolecules()
        Specified by:
        getInfluencedMolecules in interface IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Overrides:
        getInfluencedMolecules in class AReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Returns:
        The list of molecules whose concentration may change after the execution of this reaction. If it returns null, it means that it will influence every other reaction with compatible context, regardless the molecules involved.

      • getInfluencingMolecules

        public List<ILsaMolecule> getInfluencingMolecules()
        Specified by:
        getInfluencingMolecules in interface IReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Overrides:
        getInfluencingMolecules in class AReaction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Returns:
        The list of the molecules whose concentration may affect the execution of the reaction. If it returns null, it means that it is influenced every other reaction with compatible context, regardless the molecules involved.

      • getRate

        public double getRate()
        Description copied from interface: IReaction
        Returns the speed of this reaction. It is an average number, and can potentially change during the simulation, depending on the implementation.
        Returns:
        the number of times this reaction is triggered per time unit.
